name: Sadek and Cooper Law Offices, LLC
overview:
Sadek and Cooper Law Offices, LLC focuses on Consumer Bankruptcy Law (Chapter 7 and Chapter 13), Business Bankruptcy Law, Real Estate Law, Family Law and General Litigation.

The Philadelphia, Pennsylvania law firm of Sadek and Cooper Law Offices, LLC specializes in representing the legal needs of our clients and their businesses in the Allentown and Philadelphia, PA area.

Sadek and Cooper Law Offices, LLC provides high quality legal services, including Consumer Bankruptcy Law, Business Bankruptcy Law, Divorce and Family Law, among other legal fields to clients throughout Allentown and Philadelphia, PA and surrounding areas, including, Montgomery, Bucks, Chester, Delaware Counties and Southern New Jersey. Our primary law office is conveniently located near public transportation and attractions in Center City Philadelphia, PA.

Our lawyers are readily available for our clients and understand that you may not be in the most ideal situation. Our office offers a free consultation with a licensed attorney, also we offer flexible and affordable payment plans for any client who needs assistance. We look forward to effectively solving your legal problems.
